content: तक्षन् {%<ab>m.</ab>%} [तक्ष्-कनिन्] {@--1@} A carpenter, wood-cutter (whether by caste or profession); अतक्षा तक्षा <ls>K. P.</ls> ‘one not a तक्षन् by caste is called तक्षन् when he acts like or follows the profession of a तक्षन् (carpenter);’ <ls>Śi. 12. 25.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of the architect of the gods.
